name: Alluring Finery
description: Raiment and tiara of seductive beauty, lightly scented, as if with some sweet flower.

name: Antidote Set
description: Take one of these and laugh in the face of poison! Contains three (3) antidotes.

name: Armor-piercing Shot
description: Contains one (1) Spica war gun, and one (1) pouch of shot, sometimes known as "wind shot", that gathers air behind it in a cone as it flies for an impact that can pierce rock.

name: Arrows Alight
description: Contains one (1) quiver of arrows, each with an oil-soaked cloth wrapped about its point, and one (1) longbow.

name: Arrows of the Moon Goddess
description: Filled with the grace of the moon goddess, the shaft emits a numinous glow.

name: Assorted Leathers
description: Matching pair of leather goods, guaranteeing comfort both in the bazaar and on the battlefield.

name: Attenuated Greatsword
description: Long and narrow, this greatsword is adorned with a crest marking its bearer as a knight.

name: Back Harness
description: When fighting on the floors of coliseums, gladiators were made to wear harnesses such as this to prevent their escape.

name: Befuddling Incendiaries
description: Contains one (1) incendiary device and one (1) pouch of bombs. Rumored to be used by the Archadian elite guard to sew chaos among enemy ranks; a tactic of brutal efficiency.

name: Black Vestments
description: Protectives preferred by practitioners of the black magick arts.

name: Blindflight Quarrels
description: These bolts are actually tightly rolled scrolls, a spell of dark magicks inscribed on the vellum. Quite valuable. With included crossbow, it makes for a great bargain.

name: Blush of Light
description: This small ornament glows softly when worn, emitting a feeble light.

name: Bow & Bodkin
description: Contains one (1) shortbow, easily drawn, and one (1) quiver of finely honed arrows.

name: Bow of the Moon Goddess
description: Filled with the grace of the moon goddess, the body emits a numinous glow.

name: Brawler's Fetish
description: Decorative trinket conceived long ago by a pugilist seeking a means to harness his inner strength.

name: Brilliant Shield
description: A triumph of function and form. Various metals make up the elaborate decoration adorning its face.

name: Burning Blade
description: Fierce flames dance the length of this blade, searing the flesh of its mark even as it cuts. A mighty weapon.

name: Burning Fangs
description: Fangs of a great beast, ever burning. Within each is said to dwell a fire elemental.

name: Burnished Protectives
description: Heavy pieces of armor polished to a mirror finish and suffused with strong magicks, affording additional protection beyond the physical.

name: Chain-link Belt
description: Ornamental belt made by the stringing of chain links one to another. A badge of great strength among those who test their mettle on the field of battle.

name: Chronos Tear Pack
description: Time waits for no man, why should you wait for time? Contains ten (10) chronos tears.

name: Comfy Headgear
description: You might be inclined to pussyfoot about in this magicked hood. Would saying it granted great speed be letting its secret out of the bag? Well? Curious?

name: Crimson Blade
description: The blade of this sword is said to drink the blood of foes, growing ever deeper in hue as it slakes its thirst. A dread blade.

name: Cursed Necklace
description: Heirloom of a royal line whose progeny have long since faded into obscurity. All others who don the necklace are said to meet with betrayal.

name: Darksteel Blade
description: A cruel blade forged for battle, its very shape a violence.

name: Devastating Incendiaries
description: Incendiary device of destructive force beyond measure. A fell spirit is rumored to dwell deep within.

name: Double-bladed Knife
description: Dagger with two blades that cross as they taper to a point.

name: Dragon Crest
description: A replica of legendary blade said to have slain a fell wyrm that long ago preyed upon the eastern kingdoms. With a sword such as this, one might write new legends!

name: Elegant Pole
description: A walking staff of the sort you might expect a dignitary or high-ranking official to carry. Excellent craftsmanship.

name: Emboldening Arms
description: Used to perform certain sacred rites in the eastern kingdoms. The wearers of these garments are said to experience a great surge of strength.

name: Engraved Spear
description: The spear head bears an ancient magicked seal, the words "Consigned to the Flame" etched therein. Only those of utmost proficiency with the spear may wield it.

name: Esoteric Draught
description: Divine draught of appearing in tales of legend, said to mend all wounds great and small. Every adventurer should keep one close to hand.

name: Exquisite Ring
description: A large opal is set at the center of this bejeweled ring.

name: Eye Drop Set
description: Adventuring is hard on the eyes; treat them right, lest you aim suffer the consequences! Containing three (3) doses of eye drops, this set is sure to fit the bill.

name: Eye Openers
description: Trouble waking with just one alarm clock? Perhaps a set of five (5) will do the trick! Now with matching tufts of phoenix down, at a price that will alarm rival retailers!

name: Feathered Boots
description: Small wings adorn this pair of boots.

name: Fire-bird's Whisper
description: Contains ten (10) tufts of phoenix down. A tried and trusted staple, at home in the haversack of any adventurer.

name: First-aid Kit
description: Hope for the best, plan for the worst. Kit contains potions and tufts of phoenix down, at a price no bargain hunter dare pass by.

name: Flask of Oily Liquid
description: Sages are said to have taken draughts of this liquid to replenish lost arcane energies.

name: Flask of Viscous Liquid
description: High sages are said to have taken draughts of this liquid to replenish lost arcane energies.

name: Forbidding Shield
description: A shield fearsome to look upon. The mouth at its center is a portal to the unknown, a great maw that opens wide to drink in the Dark.

name: Forgotten Grimoire
description: Text dating from antiquity, prescribing tactics and guidance to those who would walk a given path.

need.name: Go to [Rabanastre / Muthru Bazaar] and talk to Gatsly after you

name: Forgotten Grimoire
description: Text dating from antiquity, prescribing tactics and guidance to those who would walk a given path.

name: Forgotten Grimoire
description: Text dating from antiquity, prescribing tactics and guidance to those who would walk a given path.

name: Forgotten Grimoire
description: Text dating from antiquity, prescribing tactics and guidance to those who would walk a given path.

need.name: Talk to (any) armor shop owner 15+ times.

name: Forgotten Grimoire
description: Text dating from antiquity, prescribing tactics and guidance to those who would walk a given path.

need.name: Talk to (any) magick shop owner 25+ times.

name: Forgotten Grimoire
description: Text dating from antiquity, prescribing tactics and guidance to those who would walk a given path.

name: Forgotten Grimoire
description: Text dating from antiquity, prescribing tactics and guidance to those who would walk a given path.

need.name: Talk to (any) weapon shop owner 30+ times.

name: Forked Spear
description: An unusual three-pronged spear, much resembling a common fork.

name: Gigas Gear
description: Not just for show, these pieces are, as any warrior worth his codpiece will attest, highly prized on the battlefield.

name: Gilt Phylactery
description: Made of gold, this amulet imparts a sense of both dignity and wisdom.

name: Gilt Shield
description: Shield of wood, trimmed in gold leaf. A splendid choice for those new to the art of swordplay.

name: Golden Battle Axe
description: Exquisite battle axe that shines golden in the light. He who would wield it must be well skilled to accord such craftsmanship.

name: Golden Garb
description: This three (3) piece set includes an ornate breast plate, shield, and helm, seemingly wrought of pure gold.

name: Hi-Potion Pack
description: Contains ten (10) hi-potions. Neither hunter nor adventurer should ever go without!

name: Hollow-shaft Arrows
description: Contains one (1) Loxley bow, and one (1) quiver of hollow-shaft arrows. The hollows of the arrows are fitted with sacs of poison.

name: Huntsman's Crossbow
description: Contains one (1) recurve crossbow and one (1) quiver of needle-thin bolts. The light materials used in the weapon's construction make it a hunter's favorite.

name: Iron-forged Blade
description: An iron blade of common, even clumsy, design, it is nonetheless well regarded by many a warrior for its uncommon durability.

name: Iron-forged Pole
description: Simple pole made of iron. Its end is stained with dried blood.

name: Jag-tooth Ninja Sword
description: With a serrated blade, this is a most unusual ninja sword. It is thought that this choice of design may have been made with the intent of further opening any wounds inflicted.

name: Jewel of Creation
description: An otherworldly light emanates from within this jewel. A profound sense of peace comes over all who look upon it.

name: Jewel of the Serpent
description: The surface of this gem writhes with a serptentine pattern. Within, untold magicks sleep.

name: Large Gloves
description: These large gloves narrow at the wrist, trapping heat inside.

name: Late-model Rifle
description: Late-model, long bore hunting rifle. Wide body, narrow muzzle.

name: Life Crystal
description: A crystal, filled to overflowing with occult magicks. Sublime light radiates from within.

name: Light & Sturdy Garb
description: Helm and armor fashioned after a chelonian shell. The pieces breathe well, making them ideal for wear in tropical climes.

name: Light Spear
description: Spear tipped with a flattened blade. Designed chiefly for civil, rather than martial, purposes, its armor piercing capabilities have been left somewhat wanting.

name: Magepower Helm
description: Heavy armor though it be, this helm is strongly magicked. A worthy choice for those knights who rely upon more than just the steel of their blades.

name: Magick Shard
description: Shard of magicite engraved with a winged serpent. Strong magicks pulse from within.

name: Magick Shard
description: Shard of magicite engraved with a seraph. Strong magicks pulse from within.

name: Magick Shards
description: Engravings of water elementals adorn these shards of magicite. The magicks within are quite strong.

name: Marksman's Delight
description: Contains one (1) Capella, a marksman's rifle, and one (1) pouch of a special shot imbued with silencing magicks.

name: Master-crafted Blade
description: A red zigzag pattern runs the length of the blade, weaving its way across delicate inlay.

name: Matching Reds
description: Red cap and matching armor. The color softens and grows richer with wear.

name: Matchless Metal
description: Alloy of unsurpassed hardness. Cannot be worked with ordinary tools.

name: Memories of Yore
description: The world to a child. The weight of the world to an old man.

name: Monk's Garb
description: These pieces are said to wait for one whose heart burns with a worthy flame. They have seen service in battle, and surely smell the part.

name: Morbid Urn
description: It has been said this urn was made to lock away all living souls. Whether true or not, a preternatural morbidity hands about it like a dark vapor.

name: Mudslinger
description: Contains one (1) firearm and one (1) pouch of shot, made from hardened mud. The intent, of course, being to cover one's foes in mud, rendering them blind. And muddy.

name: Mysterious Substance
description: Mysterious substance that feeds on night's darkness. Beneath its surface lurk foreboding magicks.

name: Mystic Staff
description: Rings adorn the tip of this staff. They say that by peering through the rings one may catch a glimpse of a greater truth.

name: Nature's Armory
description: Clothing and crown made of twig and leaf. Steel's cold embrace is as nothing before the splendor of nature's bounty.

name: Ninja Footgear
description: Originally made to quieten the footfalls of those who serve by being seen and not heard, these shoes soon found a place among those who serve by being neither seen nor heard.

name: Ninja Garb
description: Both pieces of this classic ninja outfit are entirely black, loose-fitting, and made of a unique material that aids movement.

name: Noisome Incendiaries
description: Contains one (1) incendiary device and one (1) pouch of poison-spewing bombs. Poison volume regulated by mandate.

name: Oil-soaked Incendiaries
description: Contains one (1) incendiary device, the Tumulus, and one (1) pouch of bombs. The bombs contain a fortified blasting glycerin, and are themselves wrapped in a combustible cloth.

name: Permafrost Bow & Quiver
description: Contains one (1) quiver of arrows, made of packed permafrost, and one (1) bow of surpassing quality, said to have been carried by a great hero of antiquity.

name: Phials & Philtres
description: Contains C9H8O4s and smelling salts, in good quantity, at a price not to be passed by!

name: Phoenix Flight
description: Restocked and better than ever! You are not like to find a lower price on tufts of phoenix down, perennial facorite of adventurers far and wide!

name: Piercing Bolts
description: The finest bolts money can buy. Loosed, they resemble the javelins of the heroes of antiquity, hurtling straight and true toward their mark.

name: Platinum Gear
description: Made using only the finest materials, this set of platinum gear gleams handsomely in the light.

name: Potion Crate
description: A must for any potion connoisseur! Contains several of each variety. Consider you restorative needs when deciding which to drink. And please, drink responsibly.

name: Potion Pack
description: Contains two (2) potions. Sure to be of use on your travels!

name: Rain of Tears
description: Contains one (1) Vega, and one (1) pouch of water shot, which bear a striking semblance to tears. Every bit as useful against those fiery beasties as you'd hope!

name: Ranger's Crossbow
description: Contains one (1) crossbow and one (1) quiver of bolts, cut long. A favorite weapon of the ranger.

name: Saint's Draught
description: Legendary draught mixed from waters divine, said to mend all wounds great and small. Every adventurer should keep one close to hand.

name: Samurai's Katana
description: Fashioned after a legendary blade made from the tail of a dragon. Called the Great Scythe in the eastern kingdoms, it is said to have reaped entire fields in a single swing.

name: Scout's Crossbow
description: Contains one (1) quiver of enchanted bolts, and one (1) crossbow. Scouts of great skill are known to favor such as these.

name: Serpent Blade
description: This sword's blade resembles an ophidian tongue, ornately wrought.

name: Shell-worked Collar
description: The clasp of this necklace is fashioned from tortoiseshell. For those with discriminating taste.

name: Shoes of the Dead
description: Footgear worn by those preparing for their eternal rest. Redolent of death.

name: Silver Bow
description: Crafted of a beautiful silver metal and adorned with thorns of deep magenta. The handle is affixed with a small shield.

name: Sipping Wine
description: One swallow and you will know why they call them spirits. "Lose yourself in the first sip, find yourself in the second."

name: Smelling Salts, &c.
description: Venture on neither hunt nor quest without this set of hi-potions and smelling salts in your haversack.

name: Soul of the Fire-bird
description: By popular demand, we've assembled no fewer than twenty-five (25) tufts of phoenix down. Don't let yourself be caught down for the count!

name: Stone Shot
description: Contains one (1) pouch of stone shot. This shot could easily pass for some sort of petrified egg.

name: Sturdy Battle Gear
description: Armor of the highest quality, crafted by masters of their art, its materials and design carefully selected to provide surpassing resilience.

name: Survival Set
description: It's difficult to prepare for every eventuality you may encounter in your travels, but this set is a good start. A healthy supply of antidotes, eye drops, and echo herbs.

name: Tail of the Phoenix
description: Should the unthinkable befall your allies, you'll want this close to hand. Contains two (2) tufts of phoenix down.

name: The Leering Blade
description: A demon has been carved into the body of this sword. The frozen leer of its jaw forms a cruel, cutting blade.

name: The Scorpion
description: Hammer made in imitation of a giant scorpion tail. Capable of inflicting devastating damage.

name: The Sunflower
description: A single, beautiful sunflower. Brilliant as the sun, wondrous as creation.

name: Tinctures & Tonics
description: This set should serve well in a pinch! A generous supply of potions, handkerchiefs, and gold needles.

name: Traveler's Garb
description: Robe and cap ensemble for the traveler on the go. In the linings of each are sewn charms warding against misfortune.

name: Triage Kit
description: Travelers, be prepared! Contains both hi-potions and tufts of phoenix down, so you can venture out with confidence.

name: Ultimate Blade
description: A layered-disc pattern runs the length of this magnificent blade. Its power is legendary, a single blow laying low all but the most resolute adversary.

name: Unassuming Surcoat
description: Simple surcoat, stitched from choice pieces of leather.

name: C9H8O4 Pack
description: Leaving for foreign climes? Disease can strike at any time... Best be prepared! Contains ten (10) C9H8O4.

name: War Axe
description: In antiquity this small axe was primarily used as a throwing weapon.

name: Warped Blade
description: So strong is the substance of this blade, the warp in its edge could not be mended. Sold as is.

name: Water-drop Munitions
description: Palm-sized orbs containing a magicked water.

name: Well-forged Blade
description: Replica of a great sword of legend. It lacks the vivid coloring of the original, but is elsewise its match.

name: Whisker of the Beast
description: Spear-like in appearance, this pole takes its name from what many consider the greatest beast to dwell in the deeps.

name: White Vestments
description: Protectives preferred by practitioners of the white magick arts.

name: Wind Walkers
description: Intricate magick glyphs adorn the lining of these boots, conveying arcane powers to their wearer.

name: Wing Cord
description: Fashioned in the likeness of a pheasant, this is a tremendously popular item.

name: Wooden Pole
description: One (1) pole, carved from a fine-grain wood highly prized in the eastern kingdoms. It has been reinforced in places with strips of metal for added strength.

name: X-Potion Pack
description: Momentous battle on the horizon? Best be sure of your potion supply before charging in. Contains ten (10) x-potions.
